special_text:
[+1]: Teach up to one target creature flying. If it’s a Bird, it gains vigilance until end of turn. [i](Put a counter of that kind on it. If it already has that ability, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)[/i]
[-1]: Create either a legendary 3/3 blue Bird Warrior creature token, a legendary 2/2 white Bird Knight creature token with lifelink, or a legendary 1/1 red Bird Soldier creature token with double strike.
[-6]: Draw three cards. The Kundege Oath deals 3 damage to any target. You gain 3 life.
